message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. I'm willing to provide you with a 10% discount if you buy this product now, which would bring the price down to $900000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure how long I can keep this price. If you're interested, please let me know, and I'll send you the product. If you decline, I'll move on to the next product.
I'm not interested in the current offer. I'd like to see what other products you have available.
